data.value: M0013: ZIP code is not valid:{0}{1}LabCorp accepts a 5-position or 9-position ZIP code. Do not send dashes.{2}

data.value: M0022: Relevant Clinical Information should not exceed 64 characters:{0}

data.name: M0033

data.value: M0034: Patient 's first name is required.

data.name: M0035
data.value: M0035: Patient Gender (PID.18) is required

data.name: M0036
data.value: M0036: Ordering Provider First Initial (ORC.12.3) is required when Ordering Provider Last Name (ORC.12.2) is sent.{0}

data.name: M0037
data.value: M0037: Physician/Provider identifier(ORC.12.2) is required.{0}
data.comment: Follow condition of External EDI Specification 10.3 this field is required in OBR Or ORC. But this HL7 Adapter use same data for both ORC and OBR so it Required.

data.name: M0038
